answers.answer: Wow, I don't know, but call your Vet right away and  ask them.  If your Vet is closed, call your nearest Animal ER.  How is kitty acting?

Really.....this could be a possible emergency situation, and you are writing to a forum?  Instead of waiting for a response from us, you need to take action immediately before that drug gets into your cat's body.  CALL THE EMERGENCY VET NOW!!!!  Don't even take a chance.Since you have a computer, you could do a quick research of HCG and also on how to induce vomiting.

question: My husband accidentally gave our cat 20 mg of hcg used for his weight loss instead of the 6mg of insulin that is for the cat's diabetes. what side effects will occur in the cat, hopefully it won't kill him..  thanks
title: hcg given to cat
